includeLayers.name: Base Data
includeLayers.description: Base data such as town & county boundaries, parcels and roads.

includeLayers.name: Infrastructure
includeLayers.description: Infrastructure data such as schools, fire and rescue stations and data from a road vulnerability study.

includeLayers.name: Coastal Management
includeLayers.description: Coastal management data such as access sites, flood zones and protected lands.

includeLayers.name: Habitats
includeLayers.description: Habitat data including aquaculture sites, public oyster grounds, marshes and SAV beds.

includeLayers.name: Physical Features
includeLayers.description: Physical features including soils, wetlands, land cover and elevation.

includeLayers.name: Social and Economic
includeLayers.description: Various population data from the U.S. Census Bureau.
